p: MA-104 cells were purchased from the China Center for Type Culture Collection (CCTCC, GDC041) and grown in Dulbecco's Modified Eagle Medium (DMEM, HyClone) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS), 100U/ml penicillin, 0.1mg/ml streptomycin. Porcine RV (OSU strain) was purchased from China Veterinary Culture Collection Center (CVCC, AV59). The RV was propagated in MA-104 cells in the presence of 2Î¼g/ml trypsin, and harvested after three freeze-thaw cycles [ 35]. The titer of the virus was expressed as 50% tissue culture infectious dose per milliliter (TCID 50/ml) [ 36]. The resveratrol dry suspension (RDS) was prepared in the Natural Medicine Research Center, Sichuan Agricultural University (Chengdu, China).
